sourcesContent:
import { Avatar, Button, Divider, Grid, Modal, Paper, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; import React from 'react'; import FilterNoneIcon from '@material-ui/icons/FilterNone'; import AssignmentIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Assignment'; import NearMeIcon from '@material-ui/icons/NearMe'; import HistoryIcon from '@material-ui/icons/History'; import img from '../common/azeem.jpg' import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'; import CardActionArea from '@material-ui/core/CardActionArea'; import CardActions from '@material-ui/core/CardActions'; import CardContent from '@material-ui/core/CardContent'; import CardMedia from '@material-ui/core/CardMedia'; import * as serviceproviderService from "../../Axios-Actions/serviceproviderService"; class serviceProviderDashboard extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state={ profile:[], updateOpen: false }; } componentDidMount(){ serviceproviderService.getprofile() .then((result)=>{ this.setState({profile:result.data}); }) }; render(){ let { profile } = this.state; return(
Completed Orders {profile.ordercompleted}
Credit earned {profile.creditearn}
Joined date {profile.joindate}
Accepted Tasks Task Details
Active Tasks Task Details
{profile.serviceprovidername}
Service Provider
Update Info:
First Name:
Last Name:
Password:
Contact No:
) } } export default serviceProviderDashboard;
